description:
USN-3496-1 fixed a vulnerability in Python. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 It was discovered that Python incorrectly handled decoding certain strings.
 An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.
title: Python vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Python could be made to run arbitrary code.
